rules: Rule1: If GlobalBank acquires AutoFinanceCo or GlobalBank grows revenue, then this condition is satisfied.
Rule2: If GlobalBank expands into the European market, then when GlobalBank passes the regulatory audit, GlobalBank is not fined by Regulator A.
Rule3: GlobalBank acquires a fintech startup or GlobalBank expands into the European market.
Rule4: If GlobalBank enters Latin America, then GlobalBank partners with a local bank or GlobalBank grows revenue.
Rule5: GlobalBank faces political risk or GlobalBank enters Latin America.
Rule6: If GlobalBank hedges currency risk, then GlobalBank does not face political risk.
Rule7: If GlobalBank hires a risk manager, then GlobalBank hedges currency risk.
Rule8: GlobalBank hires a risk manager or GlobalBank trains the risk team.
Rule9: If GlobalBank trains the risk team, then GlobalBank hedges currency risk.
Rule10: If GlobalBank merges with a rival bank, then GlobalBank does not dominate market share.
Rule11: GlobalBank merges with a rival bank or GlobalBank does not divest an underperforming unit.
Rule12: If GlobalBank operates in the Asia region, then the Asia region is profitable for GlobalBank.
Rule13: GlobalBank opens a London office or GlobalBank acquires a UK bank.
Rule14: If GlobalBank acquires a UK bank, then GlobalBank expands into the European market.
Rule15: If GlobalBank develops a mobile platform, then when GlobalBank does not grow revenue, GlobalBank launches an investment fund.
Rule16: If GlobalBank partners with a tech company, then when GlobalBank does not grow revenue, GlobalBank launches an investment fund.
Rule17: If the mobile platform is successful for GlobalBank, then GlobalBank develops a mobile platform or GlobalBank partners with a tech company.
Rule18: If the Asia region is profitable for GlobalBank, then GlobalBank does not acquire AutoFinanceCo.
Rule19: If GlobalBank improves customer service, then when GlobalBank implements a compliance program, GlobalBank is not fined by Regulator A.
Rule20: If GlobalBank implements an AI system, then GlobalBank improves customer service.
Rule21: GlobalBank implements an AI system or GlobalBank hires service consultants.
Rule22: If GlobalBank hires service consultants, then GlobalBank improves customer service.
Rule23: GlobalBank is compliant with regulations or Regulator A does not approve the expansion plan.
Rule24: If GlobalBank implements a compliance program, then GlobalBank passes the regulatory audit.
Rule25: If GlobalBank passes the regulatory audit, then GlobalBank satisfies regulatory requirements.
Rule26: If GlobalBank merging with a rival bank does not lead to GlobalBank dominating market share, then GlobalBank is investigated by the antitrust authority.
Rule27: If GlobalBank merging with a rival bank does not lead to GlobalBank dominating market share, then GlobalBank is not investigated by the antitrust authority.
Rule28: If GlobalBank operating in the Asia region does not lead to GlobalBank not acquiring AutoFinanceCo, then GlobalBank divests an underperforming unit.
Rule29: If GlobalBank opening a London office does not lead to GlobalBank expanding into the European market, then GlobalBank fails in European expansion.
Rule30: If the mobile app being popular with customers does not lead to the mobile platform being successful for GlobalBank, then the legacy system is outdated at GlobalBank.
Rule31: If the mobile app being popular with customers does not lead to the mobile platform being successful for GlobalBank, then the legacy system is not outdated at GlobalBank.
Rule32: If GlobalBank satisfying regulatory requirements does not lead to GlobalBank not being fined by Regulator A, then GlobalBank is penalized by Regulator A.
Rule33: If GlobalBank not growing revenue does not lead to GlobalBank launching an investment fund, then GlobalBank is fined by Regulator A.
Rule34: If GlobalBank not growing revenue does not lead to GlobalBank launching an investment fund, then GlobalBank implements a compliance program.
Rule35: If GlobalBank does not grow revenue, then Regulator A approves the expansion plan.
facts: Fact1: GlobalBank operates in the Asia region.
Fact2: The mobile app is popular with customers.
Fact3: GlobalBank does not acquire a fintech startup.
Fact4: GlobalBank does not partner with a local bank.
Fact5: GlobalBank does not fail in European expansion.
Fact6: GlobalBank does not get penalized by Regulator A.
Fact7: GlobalBank is not compliant with regulations.
Fact8: GlobalBank does not launch an investment fund.
